parties.title: Grilled Deviled Chickens Under a Brick
parties.description: Grilling these chickens under a heavy weight will help them cook quickly and evenly, leaving them crisp and juicy.
ingredientLines: 4 baby chickens (poussins) or cornish hens (about 1 1/4 pounds each), or 4 chicken breast halves
1 tablespoon crushed red-pepper flakes, or to taste
